I've played this game on a few different accounts. I would say that I recommend it, but it's a flat out lie. Overall, the game is just unenjoyable as of present-- killers camp and tunnel, survivors are toxic as all hell, my friends have had run-ins with hackers and the match making system is deplorable! When they reworked it (the matchmaking system), all they did was remove numbers and add ranks similar to games like League of Legends-- (which is another game that I have played a decent amount). Oddly enough, I'd rather play League ranked than this stupid game. At least the matchmaking in League is ever so slightly less brain-dead than that of this game! I, someone who is probably Ash III (presently, as I only play with friends because solo queue in DBD is ridiculous...) Should not be queued against someone who is Iridescent I. I have uninstalled and reinstalled this game countless times trying to give it another shot, keeping it purely because it's another game my friends enjoy, because for me, the game has lost its touch. Even if the matchmaking was better, the hit-boxes are enough to make me want to punch my monitor. Oh yes, I am behind the killer facing the opposite way from my body and he swings-- direct hit! 

The one thing that is fun is this game is playing with your friends in a four stack playing consentual sandbagging-- where everyone agrees that they don't care about their rank and just want to mess around. so unless you are playing this game for shits and giggles with three friends or want to have a brain aneurysm-- I do not recommend playing this game.

五年了家人们，五年了这破游戏还是对守尸屠夫没有严厉惩罚，就只是掉点分而已，但是被守尸的逃生者没有任何游戏体验，能直接被第一挂挂到死，只能拿几千分，掉段位，而且被守尸的逃生者如果因为游戏体验差而强退房间还会被叠加禁赛，禁赛时间从5分钟叠加到72小时不等。就像执法者对强奸犯只进行少量罚款一样，反而把被侵犯者关进大牢。不知道的还以为这种严重破坏游戏体验和游戏公平性的垃圾惩罚机制是韩国运动员想出来的。这游戏不叫《黎明杀机》，叫《尸守黎明》。

Five years on, FIVE YEARS fellows, this damn game still doesn't severely punish those campers, only a few points deducted, but it makes players which were camped felt too bad about the game experience. Survivors were hooked and camped to death directly, other teammates were afraid to rescue them, camped survivors got few points, got rank degraded, and if camped survivors force quit the match because of terrible game experience, they will be suspended for 5 mins, 10 mins, 30 mins, 1 hour, 2 hours, 6 hours, 12 hours, 24 hours, 48 hours and even 72 hours. It's so ridiculous. It seems just like police punished rapists with only a small fine, and put the raped guys in prison. I might think this garbage punishment mechanism that seriously destroys the game experience and game fairness is the idea of Korean athletes. This game isn't supposed to named Dead By Daylight, it should be named CAMP TILL DAYLIGHT.

Dieses Spiel ist absolut empfehlenswert, wenn man Bock auf einen Online-Multiplayer hat, der spannend ist. Gruselig? Naja, aber definitiv sehr spannend. Wer es besonders schwierig mag, spielt am besten Killer, denn das ist anstrengender als Survivor. Dafür hat man als Killer aber mehr Abwechslung, zumindest wenn man verschiedene Killer spielt. Die Survivor sind am Ende alle gleich und unterscheiden sich in Nuancen.

Das Gameplay ist einfach, man lernt es schnell. Danach kommt es auf Taktik und Strategie an. Das ist beim Solo Survivor am schwierigsten, denn du kannst mit den anderen nicht kommunizieren. Es führt leider dazu, dass im höheren MMR viele Survivor die gleichen 4-6 Perks haben.

Das Spiel bietet einem immer was, Challenges und Rifts, jetzt zu Weihnachten gibt es jeden Tag was geschenkt usw. 

Das einzige, was ich negativ beurteilen muss sind die Preise für die Skins. Alter, 10,86€ für einen neuen Skin, der nur auf einen Charakter passt? Was soll das? Das Spiel an sich ist nicht so teuer und den Preis definitiv wert. Aber die Skins, meine Fresse. Was auch noch verbesserungsfähig ist: Die Qualität der neuen Inhalte bzw. die Qualität des Spiels nachdem neue Inhalte, z.B. eine neue Map oder ein neues gameplay Element, ins Spiel gebracht wurden. Es gibt einen Testserver, aber oft werden diese Test ignoriert und ein neues Chapter wird mit bekannten Bugs released. Aber ansonsten, feiner Spielespaß und für einen Online-Multiplayer ist die Community auch gar nicht mal so schlimm.

Не сказать, что сильно впечатлен игрой, но в компании братюнь играется на ура. Бесит однотипная механика матчей, но в целом терпимо. Можно изредка залетать со своей бригадой мяса, дабы поиграть пару-тройку-пятнашку каток, но не более.

iyi oyun ama şu siktimin oyununda kurbanlara da katillere de rahat verilmiyor.kurban oynarsın camper tunnel aşırı respect atan katil gelir.katil oynarsın t back click-click yapanlar gelir.hiçbiri yoksa da pingin çıkar.oyunda toksik oyuncuların profiline bakarsın adam hayatsız gibi 3675 saat dbd oynamış.özellikle yeşil rank katil oynarken bunları yaşadım.hile yok oyunda ama bu oyunun communitysinin çöp olmadığı anlamına gelmez.oyunu artık kafaya takmamaya başlayınca oyun güzelleşti ve sardı.onun dışında eğer 13. cuma gibi oyunları seviyorsanız tam size göre.

Коля Коля трахни меня Коля Коля
出于好奇和追求刺激，我青少年时期就看到了这款游戏，当初觉得有点吓人但又觉得很刺激。从此以后，我就开始了解杀机，经常看那些主播游玩和解说各种角色的技能，我越来越喜欢杀机了。早在20年我就玩了杀机手机版，但太卡了后来卸载了。现在我终于如愿以偿获取了杀机，开始亲自游玩了，我敢肯定这是最好的一部非对称竞技游戏。

Если вы хотите во что-то поиграть с друзьями,повеселиться,порофлить.Эта игра идеальный вариант.Соло гейминг не советую.Особенно играя за маньяка,ибо 4 сюрва со связью унизят вас так,как в школе не унижали,возможно даже доведут до слёз,так что соло не рекомендую,но если у вас стальные нервы,то вперед играть за маньяка.А так в целом моя оценка  игре 8/10.Советую!
